name: Super High Maneuver Flight
description:
Sightseeing flight. You can use two settings airplane.

One side, It's normal setting. you can fly easily.

Other side, It is called "too peaky you can't fly". you can fly difficult.

How to Play

You set Leap Motion on the desk.

and you can use Oculus Rift DK2.
